full_text: Fon eet a Pigatn Bees IN THE HIGH COURT OF KERALA AT ERNAKULAM 2021/KER/1525 PRESENT THE HONOURABLE MR. JUSTICE P.SOMARAJAN MONDAY, THE 11TH DAY OF JANUARY 2021 / 21TH POUSHA, 1942 Crl1.MC.No.6836 OF 2017 AGAINST THE ORDER/JUDGMENT IN CMP 1175/2015 OF SPECIAL COURT OF JUDICIAL MAGISTRATE OF FIRST CLASS FOR TRIAL OF CASES U/S.138 NI ACT (JMFC XI) PETITIONER/ACCUSED: R.MURUGAN MANAGING PARTNER, PRS BUILDERS, 25/2412/2, SOUNDARYA BUILDING, MG ROAD, TRIVANDRUM. BY ADVS. SRI .R.PADMARAJT SRI.P.J.ANTONY JOSEPH MARTADAS SRI.R.AJITH KUMAR [V.K.EDOM] SMT.P.A.SALEENA SAJTI RESPONDENT/COMPLAINANT & STATE: 1 DR.GOPINATHAN SREEDHARAN INDRAPRASTHA, KARINGANNOOR MURI, VELINALLOOR VILLAGE, KOTTARAKKARA TALUK, KOLLAM DIST.694 336 2 SUB INSPECTOR OF POLICE VANCHIYOOR POLICE STATION, TRIVANDRUM.695 001 3 THE STATE OF KERALA REPRESENTED BY PUBLIC PROSECUTOR, HIGH COURT OF KERALA. 682031 R1 BY ADV. SRI.K.K.DHEERENDRAKRISHNAN R1 BY ADV. SRI.D.FEROZE R1 BY ADV. SRI.S.RAJEEV R1 BY ADV. SRI.V.VINAY PUBLIC PROSECUTION .SMT.M.N.MAYA THIS CRIMINAL MISC. CASE HAVING BEEN FINALLY HEARD ON 11.01.2021, THE COURT ON THE SAME DAY PASSED THE FOLLOWING: 2a eye Pleat Crl.MC.No.6836 OF 2017 2 202UKER/525 ORDER The matter is settled out of court, at the intervention of the mediation. Report received. As such, the Crl.M.C. become infructuous. Hence, the Crl.M.C. is dismissed as infructuous. Sd/- P.
